channel.title: Need help on changing shops and stuff
channel.description:
ok i got a new source and there is this one shop that whenever i trade the guy it shuts ther server down and i have to re run my runserver.bat
please tell me how to fix and add shops or give me a link on how to add and remove shops
i was also told that to do this i have to open the file called shops but i dont have one like that
